responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "2F87085149CE59D361AF0FBFA48CD624", "(This tome details the life and times of Uulorian the Lost, an apprentice mage to the great wizard, Ozu. He was lost in a portal experiment and was never seen again. He has returned to Verra to unite the bandits as the Forsaken Blades. They will be has personal army and with the Star of Blinding Light he will claim the portal and Lionhold. The artifacts true name is the Star of Ozu.)")
name: MADD_0005A_SNB_RecordOfLost_4
